readable.title: 2216568822_84c295c3b0
readable.content: A roller derby woman wearing a helmet has a tattoo of a white Indian pulling back a bow . a woman wearing a pink crash helmet has a tattoo of a native American on her shoulder . The lady has a tattoo . This helmeted person has a tattoo of an indian lady on their arm . Woman with red crash helmet and Native American tattoo on her arm .
